French border police accused of causing shipwrecks and deaths of migrants from Comoros
subhead: Since 2010, several hundred Comorians have died at sea while trying to reach the French overseas territory of Mayotte. A joint investigation by Le Monde and Lighthouse Reports shows that police maneuvers are implicated in several of these shipwrecks.

Israel launches ground assault after heavy strikes on Gaza City
subhead: On Tuesday morning, Palestinian residents reported heavy overnight strikes across Gaza City. Later, Israeli military officials said that their army was 'transitioning into the next phase' in the occupied territory.
byline: Le Monde with AP and AFP

title: In Ukraine, the delicate balance of power between security imperatives and democratic demands
subhead: After criticism from the opposition, which has accused President Zelensky's government of restricting its ability to act, and following a political crisis in July that exposed a lack of independence in Parliament, parliamentary debates will once again be broadcast live.

title: After four years of suspension, TotalEnergies prepares to restart its controversial gas megaproject in Mozambique
subhead: Despite a complex security situation, the French energy giant has announced plans to resume work at the northern Mozambique site by September 19.

title: Francesca Albanese, a critical Western voice on Gaza
subhead: At a conference at a left-wing festival near Paris, the UN special rapporteur on the occupied Palestinian territories received a standing ovation after denouncing European governments' inaction over Israel's destruction of Gaza. Her stance has drawn accusations of antisemitism and activism from critics.
byline: By Allan Kaval (Rome (Italy), correspondent), Benjamin Barthe and Madjid Zerrouky

title: Charlie Kirk assassination: The suspect's disconcerting profile
subhead: Tyler Robinson, arrested on Thursday night, is a 22-year-old White man who grew up in a conservative family in Utah and was a brilliant high school student. Nothing in his background supports the theory being propagated in MAGA circles that he is a far-left activist.
